events.message: The customer submitted a claim reporting a car collision that occurred on April 28, 2024, at an intersection near downtown.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under auto accident due to the involvement of the insured vehicle in a collision.
An agent was assigned to handle the case and contact the claimant to gather further details about the car accident.
The claimant was informed that the claim has been received and is now being processed actively by the insurance company.
Requested the claimant to provide a police report, photos of the car damage, and a copy of the driving license for claim verification.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including police report, detailed photos of the accident damage, and personal identification.
The investigation team started a thorough review of the accident circumstances, including consulting witness statements and vehicle inspection reports.
The investigation was completed without issues, confirming the circumstances of the collision and validating the claim details provided.
A settlement offer was prepared and proposed to the claimant based on the assessed vehicle damage and liability coverage.
The claimant responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the handling of the claim.
The claim was officially approved by the insurance management team following the acceptance of the proposed settlement by the customer.
Payment was issued to the claimant promptly to cover the vehicle repair costs as per the approved settlement agreement.
The claim was officially closed after successful settlement payment and no further issues were reported by the claimant.
All documents and communications related to the claim have been archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
